columns.name: Connection / Belonging
columns.reason: Found S10a and S11a in the data map; both are the question 'Which best describes the reason for having a drink in the past week?' with value 1 = Connection/Belonging. Direct variable equality mapped exactly.

columns.name: Status / Image
columns.reason: Found S10a and S11a in the data map; both have value 2 = Status/Image. Direct variable equality mapped exactly.

columns.name: Exploration / Discovery
columns.reason: Found S10a and S11a in the data map; both have value 3 = Exploration/Discovery. Direct variable equality mapped exactly.

columns.name: Celebration
columns.reason: Found S10a and S11a in the data map; both have value 4 = Celebration. Direct variable equality mapped exactly.

columns.name: Indulgence
columns.reason: Found S10a and S11a in the data map; both have value 5 = Indulgence. Direct variable equality mapped exactly.

columns.name: Escape / Relief
columns.reason: Found S10a and S11a in the data map; both have value 6 = Escape/Relief. Direct variable equality mapped exactly.

columns.name: Performance
columns.reason: Found S10a and S11a in the data map; both have value 7 = Performance. Direct variable equality mapped exactly.

columns.name: Tradition
columns.reason: Found S10a and S11a in the data map; both have value 8 = Tradition. Direct variable equality mapped exactly.

columns.name: Own Home
columns.reason: Found S9r1 matching 'At your home' in the data map; checkbox coded 0=Not selected,1=Selected so S9r1 == 1 selects assigned respondents.

columns.name: Others' Home
columns.reason: Found S9r2 matching 'At someone else's home' in the data map; checkbox coded 0/1 so S9r2 == 1 is the correct filter.

columns.name: Work / Office
columns.reason: Found S9r3 matching 'At work/office' in the data map; use S9r3 == 1 to capture assigned respondents.

columns.name: College Dorm
columns.reason: Found S9r4 matching 'At college/university dorm or apartment' in the data map; checkbox value 1 indicates selection.

columns.name: Dining
columns.reason: Original expression grouped S9_5 OR S9_6 OR S9_7; data map contains S9r5 (casual dining), S9r6 (upscale casual), S9r7 (fine dining). Combined OR across these checkbox variables selects respondents assigned to any dining location.

columns.name: Bar / Nightclub
columns.reason: Original expression grouped S9_8 OR S9_9 OR S9_10 OR S9_11; data map contains S9r8..S9r11 for sports bar, craft cocktail, premium bar, and nightclub respectively. Combined OR selects any assigned to bar/nightclub locations.

columns.name: Hotel / Motel
columns.reason: Found S9r12 matching 'At a hotel or motel' in the data map; S9r12 == 1 captures assigned respondents.

columns.name: Recreation / Entertainment / Concession
columns.reason: Original expression grouped S9_13 OR S9_14; data map contains S9r13 (recreation/entertainment) and S9r14 (concession stand/festival). Combined OR selects respondents assigned to either category.

columns.name: Outdoor Gathering
columns.reason: Found S9r15 matching 'At an outdoor gathering' in the data map; use S9r15 == 1 to select assigned respondents.

columns.name: Airport / Transit Location
columns.reason: Found S9r16 matching 'At airport or other transit location' in the data map; checkbox value 1 indicates assignment.

columns.name: Other
columns.reason: Found S9r99 representing 'Other (specify)' in the data map; S9r99 == 1 selects respondents who chose Other.
